title: Kardashian: The Man Who Saved O.J. Simpson
description: After O.J. Simpson was arrested for murder, some believe his attorney and confidant Robert Kardashian destroyed a bag of damning evidence.

title: Karl Marx City
description: A documentarian returns to her formerly East German hometown to investigate her father's suicide and whether he collaborated with the secret police.

title: Keith Richards: Under the Influence
description: In a documentary with unparalleled access, discover the people and sounds that inspired rock 'n' roll legend Keith Richards from childhood to today.

title: Ken Burns: The Civil War
description: Ken Burns's documentary depicts the action of famous Civil War battles, and relates the stories of soldiers, generals and a beleaguered president.
actors: Sam Waterston, Julie Harris, Jason Robards, Morgan Freeman

title: Ken Burns: The Roosevelts: An Intimate History
description: Award-winning documentarian Burns profiles three members of one of America's premier political families: Theodore, Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt.

title: Ken Burns: The West
description: Historian Ken Burns and his team bring to life the challenges Americans faced in the 19th century as they embarked on westward expansion.

title: Killer Legends
description: The origins of four terrifying urban legends are examined on a spine-chilling journey into the true crimes that may have inspired them.

title: Killswitch
description: Hackers Aaron Swartz and Edward Snowden took on the world's most powerful interests. Is their work a cautionary tale -- or will it spark a revolution?
actors: Edward Snowden, Lawrence Lessig, Tim Wu, Peter Ludlow

title: Kingdom of Us
description: A father's suicide sends a family of eight on a journey through childhood memories and treacherous emotional waters in this poignant documentary.

title: KKK: The Fight for White Supremacy
description: Members of the Ku Klux Klan speak openly about their supremacist ideology and how they believe white Americans must prepare for a race war.

title: Knocking on Heaven's Door
description: Behind Yuri Gagarin's triumphant 1961 space flight lies the fascinating tale of a reclusive mystic, a struggling teen and a quest for immortality.

title: Koko: The Gorilla Who Talks
description: Witness the incredible, decades-long friendship between Koko the gorilla and Penny Patterson, who taught Koko to communicate via sign language.
